      • getXSDateAttribute

        public static Date getXSDateAttribute(org.xmlpull.v1.XmlPullParser parser,
                      String namespace,
                      String name)
                               throws org.xmlpull.v1.XmlPullParserException,
                                      IOException
        Parses an attribute as xs:date.
        Parameters:
        parser - parser
        namespace - namespace
        name - name
        Returns:
        parsed Date value or null if no attribute found
        Throws:
        org.xmlpull.v1.XmlPullParserException - if an XML error occurs.
        IOException - if an I/O error occurs.
